properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 2:44PM AKST until January 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
Expect wind chills to 40 below zero.

* WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range in Isabell Pass from Trims Camp
south.

* WHEN...6 AM Thursday to 3 PM Friday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds of 15 to 25 mph are occuring
through Isabell Pass from Black Rapids south. As temperatures
drop on Thursday, very cold wind chills will develop, that will
persist into Friday. Travelers should be prepared for drifting
snow and very cold wind chills.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 3 PM AKST FRIDAY
